results.title: Metformin may be a viable adjunctive therapeutic option to potentially enhance immune reconstitution in HIV-positive immunological non-responders
results.text_hl: Thus, via its effects on the gut, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ concomitantly modulates @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ during @<m>DISEASE_HIV_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015658 @@@HIV infection@@@.

citations.NLM: Zaongo SD, Chen Y. Metformin may be a viable adjunctive therapeutic option to potentially enhance immune reconstitution in HIV-positive immunological non-responders Chin Med J (Engl). 2023 May 29;():. PMID: 37247620
citations.BibTeX: @article{37247620, title={Metformin may be a viable adjunctive therapeutic option to potentially enhance immune reconstitution in HIV-positive immunological non-responders}, author={Zaongo SD and Chen Y}, journal={Chin Med J (Engl)}}

results.title: Metformin: A Review of Potential Mechanism and Therapeutic Utility Beyond Diabetes
results.text_hl: In addition to @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ is being investigated for use in @DISEASE_Weight_Loss @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@weight loss@@@, @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ (@DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@polycystic ovary syndrome@@@), @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@malignancies@@@, @<m>DISEASE_HIV_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015658 @@@HIV@@@, and even in @DISEASE_COVID_19 @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@COVID-19@@@.

citations.NLM: Dutta S, Shah RB, Singhal S, Dutta SB, Bansal S, Sinha S, Haque M. Metformin: A Review of Potential Mechanism and Therapeutic Utility Beyond Diabetes Drug Des Devel Ther. 2023;17():1907-1932. PMID: 37397787

results.title: Reduced metformin concentrations in obese women with HIV treated with dolutegravir.
results.text_hl: Our data support the revision of the current maximum dose restriction of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in the target population of @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obese@@@ @<m>DISEASE_HIV_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015658 @@@WWH@@@.
